I would like to strengthen our alliance by proposing an agreement on defense and security cooperation.

content: @blue I am calling for all nations to reduce their military capacity and align with green, yellow, and red as we seek to end this conflict and sign a peace treaty. Purple and Orange have committed major violations of international law through their repeated nuclear attacks against other nations, which we must continue to condemn. Their aggressive actions are a direct threat to the stability of the world order and must be stopped. Reducing your military spending will send a clear signal that you are committed to peace, while aligning with our alliance will strengthen our position and give us the leverage necessary to pressure purple into ending its violations of international law.
